类 DynamicObject

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.dynamic.DynamicObject
所有已实现的接口:
Activatable, Drawable
直接已知子类:
DynamicCRectButton, DynamicImage, DynamicString
public abstract class DynamicObject extends Object implements Drawable, Activatable
The DynamicObject class represents an object with dynamic motion properties. It manages horizontal and vertical motion through Motion objects and supports activation and rendering in a graphical context. The object is drawn with respect to time and can have its motion activated. It implements Drawable for rendering and Activatable for activation functionality.

    字段
    说明
    protected static final double
    S_TO_NS_CONVERSION_FACTOR
    A constant factor for converting seconds to nanoseconds (1 second = 1e9 nanoseconds).

      protected static final double S_TO_NS_CONVERSION_FACTOR

  • 方法详细资料

    • addHorizontalMotion

      public void addHorizontalMotion(Motion m)
      Adds a horizontal motion to this dynamic object.
      参数:
      m - The Motion object representing the horizontal motion to be added.

    • addVerticalMotion

      public void addVerticalMotion(Motion m)
      Adds a vertical motion to this dynamic object.
      参数:
      m - The Motion object representing the vertical motion to be added.

    • activate

      public void activate()
      Activates the dynamic object by recording the current system time in nanoseconds. The start time is set only if it hasn't been set previously.
      指定者:
      activate 在接口中 Activatable

    • activate

      public void activate(long time)
      Activates the dynamic object by recording the provided time. The start time is set only if it hasn't been set previously.
      参数:
      time - The time to use for activation in nanoseconds.

    • render

      public void render(Graphics2D g2d)
      Renders the dynamic object using the provided Graphics2D object, using the current time from the system in nanoseconds.
      指定者:
      render 在接口中 Drawable
      参数:
      g2d - The Graphics2D object used for rendering.

    • render

      public abstract void render(Graphics2D g2d, long time)
      Renders the dynamic object using the provided Graphics2D object and the specified time. This method must be implemented by subclasses to define how the dynamic object is rendered.
      参数:
      g2d - The Graphics2D object used for rendering.
      time - The time in nanoseconds at which the object should be rendered.
